      • getUserTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getUserTasks(int UserId,
                                              boolean archivedTasks)
        Returns all the archived tasks or all the not archived tasks of the user passed as argument in the data base
        Parameters:
        UserId - id of the user
        archivedTasks - true if we want all the archived tasks, false if we want all the nor archived tasks
        Returns:
        lists of tasks in case of success, null otherwise
